metadata.title: CVE-2024-0232 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A heap use-after-free issue has been identified in SQLite in thejsonParseAddNodeArray() function in sqlite3.c. This flaw allows a localattacker to leverage a victim to pass specially crafted malicious input tothe application, potentially causing a crash and leading to a denial ofservice.

criterions.comment: sqlite: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
sqlite3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
